data.title: Western Montana's Glacier Country
data.meta_description: If you're visiting Montana to explore Glacier National Park, we've got you covered. Lodging, dining and adventuring options are limitless. And if you're looking to wander beyond the park, into the hills, valleys, rivers and charming small towns of our not-so-little corner of northwest Montana—in any season—that's our specialty too. With over 75 communities in eight counties to explore, there's really no end to discovery in this vast and vibrant region.
data.text: Surrounded by some of Western Montana's most spectacular mountains and only a few minutes from Glacier National Park, this small community sits on the edge of Hungry Horse Reservoir and Hungry Horse Dam. You can take guided tours of the dam and learn about its history and present-day function. Hungry Horse Reservoir is perfect for kayaking and stand-up paddleboarding. The town is home to local shops, lodging and plenty of huckleberry treats.
